name: Project Power (DarcZaFire)
description:
Exploring resource management inspired by mechanics like Astroneers and Rusts power management systems.

I have created a fairly modular system that makes it easy to add plenty of buildings/power management devices and the game is playable. You can beat it and there is no lose condition at the moment. There are quite a few bugs so I've added an easy reload (F10) for players to easily try again and avoid those bugs.

Please report bugs to the projects discord here, see whats on the to-do list, and talk about the potential of the game: https://discord.gg/FTTU9XACXy
